member.name: T:CSVFile.Application.Common.Behaviours.UnitOfWorkBehaviour`2
member.summary: Ensures that all operations processed as part of handling a either pass or fail as one unit. This behaviour makes it unnecessary for developers to call SaveChangesAsync() inside their business logic (e.g. command handlers), and doing so should be avoided unless absolutely necessary.
